amendment.description: An amendment numbered 80 printed in House Report 115-830 to provide funding for the SBA to do technical assistance, training and education about the 7(a)(15) employee-ownership loan guarantee program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A074) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A074) offered by Mr. Polis.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A074) Agreed to by voice vote.
